name: st8less
description: Allows to extract some functions from javascript sources by provided criteria and put them in separate js - to simplify live reload

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Alexey Grishin
